about_the_game:
Celtic Warfare is an unique deckbuilder where you take up your weapons and fight the magically enchanted board. Through proper countering and combo's you defeat enemies and raid land, defeat it's king and reap all the rewards, improve you cards further take on harder raids.

It is still in development and the current demo features the tutorial and some fights.

Soon to come will be:
- a map with more enemies
- combo's to use from your weapons
- bosses and their lieutenants with abilities
- a library to unlock and upgrade cards
- and more..
